Detailed Description

Interface for CRC functions.

Function for calculating CRC-16 checksum based on the polynomial: x^16 + x^15 + x^2 + 1 (0xa001). CRC-16 is commonly used in disk-drive applications.

Example usage to calculate CRC of values in an array: 

     uint16_t crcValue;
     crc16_init();
     for (i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) {
         crc16_update(array[i]);
     }
     crcValue = crc16_read();
